attributes.action: Allow those already in the UK switching to care visa to bring dependants
attributes.additional_details: It will affect those already in the UK and could put children at risk of separation from parents, which we believe would contravene the child's rights. This restriction could also discourage people currently in the UK from pursuing this route.
attributes.background: We want the Home Office to stop changes preventing individuals who are in the UK on any other route, including where that route permits dependants, who switch into the care visa as a care worker or senior care worker after 11 March 2024, from being able to stay with bring over dependants.
